wrapScienceJ.process

Class GenericProcessConcrete

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.process.GenericProcessConcrete
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericProcess, InputOutputPolicy

    public abstract class GenericProcessConcrete
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericProcess
    Represents a leaf in a hierarchical structure of processes, using the Composite and Visitor Pattern. A leaf runProcess() method implements an actual series of operations and contains two concrete configuration as attributes: a default configuration an a current configuration.
    See Also:
    GenericProcess, The runProcess uses the current configuration in the dedicated attribute. The current configuration is initialized as a duplicate (full copy) of the current configuration. The "Update Policy" for the concrete configuration is handled as follows in the getConfig() method:
    • "overwrite" policy: The current configuration has same reference as the default configuration and the concrete mutable instance of the single configuration instance is returned;
    • "Always ask" policy: The instance of the current is re-initialized as a duplicate of the default, and the current configuration is returned;
    • "Always use default" policy: An empty configuration set of attributes is returned for update.

        getConfig in interface GenericProcess
        Returns:
        The complete configuration for the generic process
        See Also:
        The "Update Policy" for the concrete configuration is handled as follows:
        • "overwrite" policy: The current configuration has same reference as the default configuration and the concrete mutable instance of the single configuration instance is returned;
        • "Always ask" policy: The instance of the current is re-initialized as a duplicate of the default, and the current configuration is returned;
        • "Always use default" policy: An empty configuration set of attributes is returned for update.

      • runProcess

        public abstract java.lang.Object runProcess(java.lang.Object arg,
                                            java.lang.String option)
        Specified by:
        runProcess in interface GenericProcess
        Parameters:
        arg - a generic argument if the process requires additional data or methods
        option - An optional string transmitted to the process (e.g. directory, path, etc.)
